name: Avant Brands Inc.
longDescription: Avant is an innovative market-leading premium cannabis company. Avant has multiple licensed and operational production facilities across Canada which produce high-quality handcrafted cannabis products for our highly desired and award-winning consumer brands sold across both recreational and medical channels.

Avant has multiple licensed and operational production facilities across Canada which produce high-quality handcrafted cannabis products for our highly desired and award-winning consumer brands sold across both recreational and medical channels.
